H

handleEvent(KeyEvent) - Method in class Main.GameEngine
This method is used to respond to the key inputs by the player.
handleMouseClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class Main.GameEngine
This method is used to respond to the mouse clicks by the player.
handleMouseMotion(MouseEvent) - Method in class Main.GameEngine
This method is used to respond to the mouse motion of the player.
handleReleaseEvent() - Method in class Main.GameEngine
This method is used to respond to the key releases by the player.
highscore - Variable in class Main.GameFrame
The HighScore Board, accessed from the HomeMenu.
Highscore - Class in Main
Public class Highscore is responsible for generating and showing the top 10 highest scores for each level and the total highscore for the game on the Highscore Board which can be reached from the HomeMenu.
Highscore(GameFrame, Dimension) - Constructor for class Main.Highscore
This constructor is used to create a menu face to display the highscores for each level and the total highscores for the game.
HIGHSCORE - Static variable in class Main.Highscore
Total HighScores string.
homeMenu - Variable in class Main.CustomConsole
HomeMenu which is repainted when CustomConsole closes.
homeMenu - Variable in class Main.GameFrame
The HomeMenu to access all other screens through buttons.
homeMenu - Variable in class Main.InfoScreen
HomeMenu which is repainted when InfoScreen closes.
HomeMenu - Class in Main
Public class HomeMenu is the first screen the player sees when starting the game.
HomeMenu(GameFrame, Dimension) - Constructor for class Main.HomeMenu
This constructor is used to load all the buttons on the main menu and link them to their functions.
HORIZONTAL - Static variable in class Main.GameBoardController
The code to choose a random point of the horizontal side of the brick.
